bug.author: shane-huang
bug.summary: get_nyc_taxi.sh script should download data from original github repo
bug.description: people won't be able to download this data as the address is internal only. wget <denchmark-link:http://10.239.45.10:8081/repository/raw/analytics-zoo-data/data/NAB/nyc_taxi/nyc_taxi.csv>http://10.239.45.10:8081/repository/raw/analytics-zoo-data/data/NAB/nyc_taxi/nyc_taxi.csv</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: we are moving data to sourceforge too.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/numenta/NAB/blob/v1.0/data/realKnownCause/nyc_taxi.csv>https://github.com/numenta/NAB/blob/v1.0/data/realKnownCause/nyc_taxi.csv</denchmark-link>
Whoever is going to fix this issue, please also check whether this version is the same as the one in our own repo. If not, please find the correct revision of the nyc_taxi file
